unnormalised: Borem, tor tum sabzi gheunchea khatir bazaarant vochotat, h√£? Tem sodanch thoddem adventure-achem aasa, khas korun tum kitlo gheuncho mhunnon tharavnk sodthana. Sach sangonchem mhunllear, boreant bori kimat mellovchea khatir vichar koritana units sodhun kaddop ek khel zaunk xakta.
normalised: Borem, tum bazaarant sabzi gheunk vetai, kiteak? Tem sodanch eka torechem addventura asta, khas korun kitlem viktem gheunk zai tem tharaucheak tum sodtalea vellar. Aami taka toond divum-ia, boreant borem molakatri kortana units tharavop hem ek svotachem khell zaunk xakta.

unnormalised: Poilem mhunllear, tum **kg** (kilogram) vaprunche poddte staples khatir. Batate, piyav, tomat - samany ritin kilo-n viktaat. Tum "1 kg aloo" vo "2 kg pyaaz" magonk xakta. Sompem aasa, barem? Punn ti dokandar sangonk xakta, "Yeh aloo toh bada achha hai, 1 kg mein 8-10 aayega". Multa, to tumka sangoonk sodta ki quality bori aasa mhunnon 1 kg batate kitlench ashtele. Tanka tumka bevko korchea khatir divonk naka!
normalised: Poilem, tum samanean kilograman vevhar kortele. Batato, piyav, tomatto sadharanponnan kilone vikri kortat. Tum "eka kilogram batato" vo "don kilogram piyav" magunk xaktat. Sopem asa, kiteak? Punn to vikrekar sangonk xakta, "He batato khub boro asa, eka kilograman atth te dha yetole". Mulant, to sangonk sodta ki gunvotta bori asa kiteak ek kilogramant tumkam kitle batato melltole. Taka tumkam murkh korunk dium naka!

unnormalised: Magir mushkil vostu yetat. Paalaya bazy, jeese paalak vo kothmir, te **bunches** viktaat. "Ek bunch dhaniya dena bhaiyya". Punn bunch-achem aakaar khub bodluncho asta! Eke dokandarachem bunch ek dhaktte muthi bhortalem zaunk xakta, zalear dusryachem paalaya bhortalem zaunk xakta. Sodanch dolle marun vichar kor ani khub dhaktem dista zalear bhav kor. Kednam te vozonank viktaat, zose "250 gm paalak dena". Pavo kilo, arth korta!
normalised: Uprant ieta kastdaiecho vostu. Panacho sabzi zoxe spinach (paalak) vo coriander (dhaniya) chodd korun bunchan vikri kortat. "Ek bunch dhaniya dina bhaiya". Punn bunchacho akar khub vegllo zaunk xakta! Eka vikrekarancho bunch ek lhan mutth bhar zaunk xakta, zalear dusreachem pananim bhortole. Sodanch dolleant ghal ani komi dista zalear molakatri kor. Kednam kednam te vajnanui vikri kortole, hanka sodd, "don xembore pachas gram paalak dina". Pav kilograam, orth zata!

unnormalised: Dhaktea pramanache vostun khatir, jeese mirchi vo alle, tum dokandar "pav" (pavo kilo vo 250g) kitle sangta aaikonk poddta. "Mirchi ka bhav kya hai? Rs. 20 pav". Hem Bharatachea khub bhaganchem aasa.
normalised: Lhan matrant, zoxe mirchi (mirchi) vo ginger (adrak), tum chodd korun vikrekarank "pav" (eka kilograamacho pav vo don xembore pachas gram) mol kortalem aikunk melltolem. "Mirchi ka bhav kya hai? rupiya vis pav". Hem Bharotant choddxea bhaganim chodd sadharan asa.

unnormalised: Udka sarke vostuk visar naka! Doodh samany ritin **litres** viktaat. Tum "1 litre doodh" vo "aadha litre" (aadhem litre) magonk xakta. Tel-ui samany ritin litres viktaat, zose "2 litres tel". Punn samball, thodde dokandar tumka randpache tel **grams** vikchea prayatn kortele, tem unnem dista korun. Sodanch check kara!
normalised: Dravo visrum naka! Dhuv (doodh) sadharanponnan litran vikri kortat. Tum "ek liter dhuv" vo "aadha liter" (pav liter) magunk xaktat. Telui sadharanponnan litran vikri kortat, zoxe "don liters tel". Punn samballun ravat, kain vikrekar tumkam randpachem tel graman vikunk sodtole, tem susth disounk laitat. Sodanch check korat!

unnormalised: Masale ek veglench khel aasa. Te samany ritin **grams** viktaat, khas korun dhong asle masale zose kesar. Tum "10 gm kesar" magonk xakta. Punn dhaktte, sthaanik dukana azunui junni units vaprunk xaktaat zose "tola", je 11.66 grams bhortat. Borem tumchya bhagaak badlonchea khatir!
normalised: Masale (masale) ek purnn vegllo khell asa. Te chodd korun graman vikri kortat, khas korun vostu zoxe saffron (kesar). Tum "dha gram kesar" magunk xaktat. Punn lhan, sthanik dukhanam azun pornim units vaprunk xaktat zoxe "tola", zo sumar egar point satt sat gram asa. Tem ud'dhogant bodol korunk tumchea bhagiek!

unnormalised: Ani nimanne, follam yaad dovrat! Thodde vozonank viktaat (**kg**), zose seb vo santre. Dusre **dozen** (darjan) viktaat zose kelle. "Ek darjan kela dena". Nischit zache foll aasa mahatvachem. "Yeh kela bahut chota hai," tum sangonk xakta, tum zannar ki te dhaktte kelle ek puren dozen vikchea prayatn kortale.
normalised: Ani nimannim, follam ugddas dovrat! Kain vajnan vikri kortat (kilogram), zoxe seb vo orange. Dusrim darjanan vikri kortat (darjan) zoxe kelle. "Ek darjan kela dena". Kursach, follacho akar mahatvacho. "Yeh kela bahut chota hai," tum sangonk xaktat, tum small kelleak ek purnn darjan korun sodle zalear.

unnormalised: Tor, tumka zay tem asa. Eke Bharatiya sabzi mandint units mhapchea khatir ek kala aasa. Tumche buddhiman asa, tumchi bhavani korunchea skillanchi practice kara, ani tumka spashtikaranak sodchea bhienaka! Ani pavo ek dhaktte notebook ghea kg-ache bhav likhon dovrunk, tum veg-vegle dokandar tumka poriksha korun borent bori deal melle. Happy shopping!
normalised: Taka, tumchere lagim tea vostu asto. Bharoti sabzi mandint mojechem units chalavop ek kala asa. Tumnche bud'dhik samballun dovrat, tumnchen molakatri korpachem khub borem korat, ani spoxth korunk bhionk naka! Ani kadachit prot kilogram molancher likhunk ek lhan notebook gheun vochat, tum vegllea vikrekarancho tulna korunk xaktat ani boreant borem deal gheunk zata. Khuxeal zaun shopping korat!
